column4: something is going wrong - all CD's i try to burn under ubuntu are messed up.  any ideas?
It may be burning at a higher speed than the CDRs support.
but the cool thing is, you can use a live cd.  image 10 or even 5 years ago.
Plus I have persistence working and Beryl installed .... but it's horrible I tell you!
why would you run a resource-hogging window manager with limited resources?
